5.1.4 - Fruits and vegetables consumption in population aged 15 years old and over

Information about indicator

Name of the indicator 5.1.4 Fruits and vegetables consumption in population aged 15 years old and over
Measure unit Kilos per capita per year
Description of the indicator The data shows fruits and vegetables consumption in population aged 15 years old and over per year
Data sources OECD
